name: National Inshore Fisheremen's Association Company Limited by Guarantee
goal: We are a members based representative organisation for Small Scale Commercial Sea Fisheries in Ireland. Our goals are to represent out members with a view to improving their standard of living
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Taxation
euInitiatives: Mainly Fisheries and Environment, Common Fisheries Policy (CFP) would be the most relevant to our work. We intend to apply for membership of the North Western Waters Advisory Council.
